name: Crystal Dungeon
description:
This was a game made for GameDev Gam jam 2021 by a team of 2 beginners!
if you would like to contact the devs , you can message S7505 and Keerthivardhan_1201 on Discord!

Description:
in this game, you play as a dungeon looter. You arrive at a dungeon that looks like an ordinary dungeon... but you soon discover that the prison is labyrinth filled with mysterious crystals. This maze is also set up with traps to prevent the crystals from getting into wrong hands. While collecting the crystals, you get status effects which may either be positive or hostile.  You must collect the crystals at your own risk as they pose a danger too! Keep in mind that all that Glistens is Not Gold and try to reach the portal at the end of the dungeon to escape sucessfully

Controls -
WASD - movement
Right Mouse Button - Flashlight toggle on/off
L - Quit game
M- Restart Game

NOTE: if the game controls seem to bug out , try to tab out by press win key and pressing back in.. Thanks!
